channel.title: ALOT of questions
channel.description:
Hello I was wondering any of you could help me with a few things...
Heres some basic info to help you understand better...
Source: All-StarScape v2 (PimpScape Source) Client: Kihomura's 317 Client 2.0
1. How do you get Correct SKillcape Emotes and Special Attack Animation? 2. How do i make so it takes away arrows when i shot from a bow? (It already works for Magic Bow but not others...) 3. How can i Add PK Skull to my server (i got an icon) 4. How do i add The Vengance skull to Ancient magics in the last teleport thing the G Teleport and make it have correct animation and take away like 10HP? 5. How can i make so when i use a bow i don't have to be right by the player and be like 5 spaces back? 6.How do i make so when i use throwing knifes it takes away one throwing knife? 7. How do i make so when use a head icon prayer it shows the icon? (i know i have icons cause once i click on all 3 of like 10 times 1 of the icons comes for protect from prayers not the Redemption and Smite.) 8. How do i make a PK-Point Shop? (i belive there is a pk-point system on my server...) 9. How do i change how much a npc hits? 10. Does Anybody have a Tut on how to add Pest Control to a server? 11. How do you make safe zones? (I have Attempted and it didn't work out...) 12. How do you make a lever teleport you some where? 13. How do you make so when you eat you don't need to wield amour or weps? 14. How do make it so when i pray at the a alter it gives you recharged prayer points... and same for prayer pots...
Thanks for you time and if you help!!! :)

item.dc:creator: @confusing_coder confusing_coder
item.description:

There is a place that can help you with all of these

item.title: ALOT of questions
item.dc:creator: @tw33zy tw33zy
item.description:
@tw33zy wrote:

[quote=“Dragroxas, post:1, topic:270318”]Hello I was wondering any of you could help me with a few things…

Heres some basic info to help you understand better…

Source: All-StarScape v2 (PimpScape Source)
Client: Kihomura’s 317 Client 2.0

  1. How do you get Correct SKillcape Emotes and Special Attack Animation?
  2. How do i make so it takes away arrows when i shot from a bow?
    (It already works for Magic Bow but not others…)
  3. How can i Add PK Skull to my server (i got an icon)
  4. How do i add The Vengance skull to Ancient magics in the last
    teleport thing the G Teleport and make it have correct animation and
    take away like 10HP?
  5. How can i make so when i use a bow i don’t have to be right by the player
    and be like 5 spaces back?
    6.How do i make so when i use throwing knifes it takes away one throwing knife?
  6. How do i make so when use a head icon prayer it shows the icon?
    (i know i have icons cause once i click on all 3 of like 10 times 1 of the icons comes
    for protect from prayers not the Redemption and Smite.)
  7. How do i make a PK-Point Shop? (i belive there is a pk-point system on my server…)
  8. How do i change how much a npc hits?
  9. Does Anybody have a Tut on how to add Pest Control to a server?
  10. How do you make safe zones? (I have Attempted and it didn’t work out…)
  11. How do you make a lever teleport you some where?
  12. How do you make so when you eat you don’t need to wield amour or weps?
  13. How do make it so when i pray at the a alter it gives you recharged prayer points…
    and same for prayer pots…

Thanks for you time and if you help!!! :)[/quote]

question 3, 4 and 10 i think are done on a client. (class 8 i think?)

Read full topic

item.title: ALOT of questions
item.dc:creator: @Mellor Mellor
item.description:
@Mellor wrote:

The majority of these questions are usually actually built into a downloaded server, they seem to be pretty basic questions, yet because no one has to do them , not everyone will know how to do them.

Read full topic
